channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP (Web Survey)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP (Web Survey)

item.title: CVE-2021-21490|2024-08-03T18:16:22.657Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20for%20abap%20%28web%20survey%29
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS for ABAP (Web Survey), versions - 700, 702, 710, 711, 730, 731, 750, 750, 752, 75A, 75F, does not sufficiently encode input and output parameters which results in reflected cross site scripting vulnerability, through which a malicious user can access data relating to the current session and use it to impersonate a user and access all information with the same rights as the target user.
